title: Facile fabrication of ZnO nanoparticles via non-thermal plasma technique and their anti-corrosive effects on X60 API 5L steel in 1M HCl solution
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Nourelhouda Bounedjar, Mohammed Fouad Ferhat, Chun Ouyang, Mohamed Bououdina, Ihab Shawish, Rasha A. Abumousa, Muhammad Humayun
